import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get organizations by contact email"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/organizations/for/contact"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Returns organizations where the provided email address appears as a contact. Use this to audit organization contact assignments or to identify the organizations linked to a specific contact email.

**Workflow Example**
1. Provide the contact `email` query parameter.
2. Call [GET /api/v1.0/organizations/for/contact](/docs/api/organizations/get-organizations-for-contact-email) to retrieve matching organizations.
3. Extract `Items[].OrganizationId` for follow-up actions like [GET /api/v1.0/organizations/\{OrganizationId\}](/docs/api/organizations/get-organization).

**Minimal Required Fields**: email query parameter.

**Notes**: This API version is deprecated.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"email","in":"query","required":true,"description":"Contact email address.","schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}

</RequestSchema>
